meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of a telium
meanings.sent1: The telial growth on the plant was easily recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the telial structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The telial appearance of the flower made it stand out in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed in a telial manner, spreading beauty everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The telial features of the artwork captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the telium of a rust fungus
meanings.sent1: The telial spores of the rust fungus spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the telial patches on the leaves of his crops.
meanings.sent3: The telial growth on the tree seemed like tiny rust-colored stars.
meanings.sent4: The telial invasion of the garden was like a silent army taking over.
meanings.sent5: The telial infestation turned the once green field into a rusty landscape.
